```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(mosaicData)
```



## Correlação


```{r}
data(SaratogaHouses, package="mosaicData")

SaratogaHouses %>% 
  select (price, age, lotSize, rooms, bathrooms) -> df

r <- cor(df)
round(r,2)

```

```{r}
library(ggcorrplot)
ggcorrplot(r)
```


```{r}
ggcorrplot(r, 
           hc.order = TRUE, 
           type = "lower",
           lab = TRUE)
```
